output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the totalSupply variable, allowing the owner to mint arbitrary amounts of tokens to any user account, causing a denial of service to token holders.

The distributeToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf target user, allowing the owner to distribute arbitrary amounts of tokens to any user account, causing a denial of service to token holders.

The mintToken function is restricted to the owner only, but does not check if the target address is a smart contract, allowing a user to become a minter and mint tokens to a smart contract, causing a denial of service to token holders.

The distributeToken function is restricted to the owner only, but does not check if the target addresses are smart contracts, allowing a user to become a minter and mint tokens to a smart contract, causing a denial of service to token holders.

The setPrices function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the buyTokenPerEther and sellTokenPerEther variables, allowing the owner to set these prices to arbitrary values, causing a denial of service to token holders.
